I and welcome you listening to the x-22
report my name is Dave and this is
episode 1255a and today's date is April
15th 2017 and the title of the episode
is Trump prepares the US for the
collapse of the central bankers system
let's get into the economic collapse
financial news now as we can see the
world is completely going haywire right
now the economy is falling apart at a
quicker pace than we've ever seen before
and Trump does know this he realizes
that the Fed put things into motion he
understands and not just Trump but there
are good guys in the group and they
realize that the deep state the central
bankers they are pushing their agenda to
collapse the economy and when Trump
talked about bringing back jobs bringing
back manufacturing jobs and doing all
this stuff I've always said from the
beginning this is most likely for after
the reset once this entire Fiat system
is completely wiped out that's when the
jobs and everything will come back and
what we're seeing right now is that the
entire economy is falling apart very
very rapidly now retail sales for the
second month in a row they've declined
in March and the hard data right now
well it's not living up to the soft
data's hype what we're really seeing is
that the real information the real
economic collapse of the system is
shining through right now and what we're
seeing is that this is spreading and we
can see with retail things are ripping
itself apart retail hasn't been doing
well for a very long time now the
central bankers the deep state the
corporate media they continually tried
to blame this on the weather they tried
to blame this on tax returns they try to
blame it on everything but they're
running out of excuses because what
we're seeing right now is we're seeing a
drop in a lot of the retail sector
seeing building material dropping by
negative 1 point 5 we see motor-vehicle
and parts dropping by negative 1 point 2
and for the parts negative 1 point 5 we
see Sporting Goods down negative 0.8 and
this is continually happening and this
is why stores are closing this is why
people are getting laid off and the drop
in sales well this really shouldn't be a
total surprise because what we're seeing
is that weekly earnings the average
weekly earnings well they have now
failed to rise for three straight months
in a row and again this is showing us
that things are rapidly falling apart
now the thermometer for discretionary
spending is restaurants people going out
and dining out and what we're seeing is
that the foot traffic at chain
restaurants in March dropped three point
four percent from a year ago menu prices
well couldn't be increased enough to
make up for it and some store sales fell
by 1.1 percent and what we're seeing is
that people are saying you know
something I don't have a discretionary
income I can't go out to restaurants now
in New York and New Jersey region their
sales have plunged by four point six
percent and foot truck traffic has
dropped by six point three percent so
the corporate media the deep state the
central bankers they're out there saying
well the reason for this is because the
people didn't get their tax returns well
that really isn't true anymore either
because what we're seeing right now is
that delayed in tax refunds from the IRS
well the IRS now they're almost up to
date and the floodgates open and record

out so by the end of February the IRS
was pretty much caught up so March with
all this money from the tax returns
March should be incredible
guess what March sales they didn't go
anywhere they actually declined again
what the corporate media what the deeps
ate what the central banks are doing
they're feeding everyone with fake phony
information and restaurants spending is
a thermometer for discretionary spending
which varies with how well consumers are
doing and it's the first to react
when consumers hit their limits the
first thing they cut our discretionary
items such as eating out so this is
another warning sign percolating up from
beneath the surface and we know there's
going to be a lot more beneath the
surface we saw already the Atlanta Fed
they have slashed the first quarter GDP
down to 0.5%
I mean basically at zero and this is the
manipulated number so what are we
looking at here
we are looking at a total collapse of
the system now we need to look at what
has been happening here when Trump first
came into office he was campaigning
telling everyone there's bubbles
everywhere the bubbles are getting ready
to pop they're everywhere when he was in
office he said the economy was a mess
and it was worse than he ever thought
and he started to cut the budgets and
try to trim everything tried to go down

just couldn't work that way bringing
back the jobs the manufacturing well
that's going to have to wait until this
system comes down once the Fed signaled
that they were raising rates in December
and then again in February Trump
realized that okay
they have just signaled right now that
they're ready to bring down the economy
the Fed also signaled that guess what
they're gonna ease back on stimulus all
of this is showing us that they are

down the $100 bill that was produced is
split in half one side says Federal

people we know there's a transition
coming we know it's about to happen and
the only way to have this happen right

they're like oh yeah we will show you
we're gonna crash the system the good

they want the collapse and this is the

it is so corrupt it cannot be done this
